description: This detection method points out highly relevant Antivirus events Author: Florian Roth, Arnim Rupp. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Some software piracy tools (key generators, cracks) are classified as hack tools
name: Relevant Anti-Virus Event
query: (winlog.channel:"Application" AND (*HTool\-* OR *Hacktool* OR *ASP\/Backdoor* OR *JSP\/Backdoor* OR *PHP\/Backdoor* OR *Backdoor.ASP* OR *Backdoor.JSP* OR *Backdoor.PHP* OR *Webshell* OR *Portscan* OR *Mimikatz* OR *.WinCred.* OR *PlugX* OR *Korplug* OR *Pwdump* OR *Chopper* OR *WmiExec* OR *Xscan* OR *Clearlog* OR *ASPXSpy* OR *Ransom* OR *Filecoder* OR *CobaltStrike*) AND (NOT ((*Keygen* OR *Crack*))))
